title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Qualifications and Quality
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Qualifications and Quality 
Assurance (Education and Training) Act 2012 (Learner Protection Fund) 
Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 September 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited qualification quality assurance (education training) act 2012 (learner protection fund) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 1 september 2024

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: In these Regulations,
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, 

“Act” means the Qualifications and Quality Assurance (Education and Training) 
Act 2012 (No. 28 of 2012); 

“Authority” means the Qualifications and Quality Assurance Authority of 
Ireland established under the Act; 

“Minister” means the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 2 regulation act mean qualification quality assurance (education training) act 2012 (no 28 2012) authority mean qualification quality assurance authority ireland established act minister mean minister higher education research innovation science

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 3. These Regulations prescribe the requirements of the Minister in relation
text_raw:
3. These Regulations prescribe the requirements of the Minister in relation 
to the establishment, maintenance and operation of the Learner Protection Fund.
text_norm: 3 regulation prescribe requirement minister relation establishment maintenance operation learner protection fund

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 4. The Authority shall open and maintain a separate bank account for the
text_raw:
4. The Authority shall open and maintain a separate bank account for the 

Learner Protection Fund.
text_norm: 4 authority shall open maintain separate bank account learner protection fund

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 5. The following shall be paid into the Learner Protection Fund:
text_raw:
5. The following shall be paid into the Learner Protection Fund: 

(1) all interest, dividends and other income and accretions of capital arising 

from the investment of the Learner Protection Fund or any part of it; 

(2) the proceeds of any realisation of any investments of the Learner 

Protection Fund; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [430] 3 

(3) all moneys as provided by the Minister pursuant to Section 66A(4) of the 

Act; and 

(4) any other moneys which may belong to or accrue to the Learner 

Protection Fund or be received by the Authority in respect of it.
text_norm: 5 following shall paid learner protection fund (1) interest dividend income accretion capital arising investment learner protection fund part (2) proceeds realisation investment learner protection fund notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 3rd september 2024 430 3 (3) money provided minister pursuant section 66a(4) act (4) money may belong accrue learner protection fund received authority respect it

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 6. The Authority shall keep all proper and usual accounts of all moneys paid
text_raw:
6. The Authority shall keep all proper and usual accounts of all moneys paid 
into the Learner Protection Fund and disbursements from the Learner Protection 
Fund, including: 

(1) an income and expenditure account, 

(2) a cash-flow statement, and 

(3) a balance sheet.
text_norm: 6 authority shall keep proper usual account money paid learner protection fund disbursement learner protection fund including (1) income expenditure account (2) cash-flow statement (3) balance sheet

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: In the annual report produced pursuant to subsection 66(11) of the Act
text_raw:
7. 

In the annual report produced pursuant to subsection 66(11) of the Act 

the Authority shall include annual accounts.
text_norm: 7 annual report produced pursuant subsection 66(11) act authority shall include annual account

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: In determining whether to use the moneys standing to the credit of the
text_raw:
8. 

In determining whether to use the moneys standing to the credit of the 
Learner Protection Fund in the manner set out in section 66(3)(a) or 66(3)(b) of 
the Act, the Authority shall have regard to the following matters: 

(1) The availability of arrangements which were put in place under the 

previous section 65; 

(2) The interests of the enrolled learners affected; 

(3) The availability of a similar programme; 

(4) The relative potential risks and costs of defrayment involved; 

(5) The integrity of the National Framework of Qualifications; and 

(6) The integrity of the International Education Mark. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [430] 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 August, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 August, 2024. 

PATRICK O'DONOVAN, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [430] 5

title: Minister) Order 2023 ( S.I. No. 19 of 2023 )), with the consent of the Minister
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations set out the requirements of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science on the establishment, 
maintenance and operation of the Protection of Enrolled Learners Fund by the 
Authority, Quality and Qualifications Ireland, including requirements with 
respect to the exercise by the Authority of the power of defrayment from moneys 
standing to the credit of the Protection of Enrolled Learners Fund. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [430]
